title: Using OpenAPI and Swagger UI with Quarkus
summary: This guide details how to generate an OpenAPI descriptor for a Quarkus application and utilize Swagger UI for API testing. It covers adding necessary extensions, creating REST resources, and configuring OpenAPI and Swagger UI properties. Moreover, it guides on providing application-level OpenAPI annotations, enhancing the OpenAPI schema with filters, loading schemas from static files, and practical usage of Swagger UI for development and testing.
